Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, just east of Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: You can see Leviathan Drive in the distance to the west. On the north side of the road is the massive City Walls, surrounding and protecting the city. To the south, you can see a large forest region, but cannot seem to find any way to get into it, or see or what it could possibly hide.
